hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD2$ tens and $\purpleD2$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{22}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8385f9106fde7453511e8d1a84417b80b8de572f)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD0$ tens and $\maroonD7$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{7}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8e7cba338588366bd800db805916f0ca0562d747)

Our sum shows $2$ tens and $9$ ones, or $29$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1014f7f42fd2cd821106abbf8cb1714269bb34d6)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{22} + \maroonD{7} =29$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c269004f8829d6a512ed5d420e6092438d0bcf1f)

[[☃ radio 1]]
